alert.note: Alert for Jack; Montague (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 5:44PM CDT until May 11 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Montague County in north central Texas... Northeastern Jack County in north central Texas... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 543 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Newport, or 11 miles southwest of Bowie, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bowie, Lake Amon G Carter, Newport, Fruitland, Stoneburg and Mallard. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for north central Texas. For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
